originalText.text: It’s good but I would say that the school has annoying rules and uniform. Like, we can’t bring outside drinks inside and sometimes the water fountains don’t work. I have to wait until lunch just to drink water. And also the uniform doesn’t really do anything. The teachers give you a chance to make up work so I’ll give them that.

originalText.text: Many students would be quick to hate this school but in my three years here iv'e learned that teachers are very understanding here and when kids can see past their anger and frustration they can learn to appreciate the them. The environment is very welcoming but is brung down by the actual students attending. Most of the "problems" this school has are caused by the students. This school is very underrated and deserves more recognition than it gets. And more of a budget.

originalText.text: This school is terrible. I attend this school and we don't have any extra curricular activities. The teachers are to quick to pass judgment. We're across the street from a dangerous place. Recently a very dangerous incident happened. This school is bad. Do not send children here

originalText.text: Great School!! I'm a former student and I love the school. There are many extracurricular activities and teachers who dedicate their time to help students that struggle.

originalText.text: This school is a good school because they help you if you need it and they can play jokes when we are not working
